com.intel.icecp.core.security.crypto.mac

Interface MacScheme<S extends SecretKey>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - MAC key type
    All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityService<String>

    public interface MacScheme<S extends SecretKey>
extends SecurityService<String>
    Interface for a generic Message Authentication Code (MAC)

      • verifyMac

               byte[] data,
               S key)
        throws MacError
        Given MAC, the data, and a secret key, returns true iif the MAC is verified
        Parameters:

        data - Data on which verify the MAC
        key - Key to use for verification
        Throws:
